actions.description: The adept makes three Unarmed Strike attacks or five Dart attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description:
5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage. Once per turn, the adept can cause one of the following additional effects (choose one or roll a d4):

- 1–2: Knock Down: The target must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone.
- 3–4: Push: The target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet directly away from the adept.
actions.name: Unarmed Strike

actions.description: 5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.name: Dart

specialTraits.description: While the adept is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.
specialTraits.name: Unarmored Defense
